title: Dead Trend Job 5/12: Jerry Stiller, Nelly v Ludacris, Kobe Pilot, Dave Grohl
itunes:title: Dead Trend Job 5/12: Jerry Stiller, Nelly v Ludacris, Kobe Pilot, Dave Grohl
description:
On this edition of Dead Trend Job Jack and Miles discuss the passing of legendary comedian and actor Jerry Stiller at 92, the next VERZUZ battle is Ludacris vs Nelly, the Helicopter company that flew the copter Kobe and Gigi passed away in has reflected blame onto the other passengers in the helicopter , and Dave Grohl wrote a piece for the Atlantic about when we get to go to live shows again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
